issues.title: Mention that content.json of current blog needs to be signed first
issues.body:
In the README there's a wonderfully convenient way that's mentioned on how to upgrade your current blog by simply changing the `cloned_from` value in your `content.json`. Unfortunately people can sometimes forget this file needs to be signed before this change will actually mean anything to ZeroNet :)

Can you add a quick "and sign it" to this sentence in the README so future readers won't be confused if they too forget to do this? :)
